title: 193.27 DISPOSITION OF UNUSED FUNDS.
text: In any county or municipality in this state, however organized, in which there have heretofore been bond issues or tax levies made for the construction of a public armory building in such county or municipality, which armory building has not been constructed and the moneys received from such bonds issued or taxes levied remain unexpended, upon a unanimous vote of the county board or municipal council such funds or any or all thereof may be invested by such county board or municipal council or used and expended by it for any public purpose within such county or municipality.
